Class WebRequest.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.fluxzero.sdk.web.WebRequest.Builder
Enclosing class:
WebRequest
public static class WebRequest.Builder extends Object
Fluent builder for WebRequest. Use WebRequest.builder() to start building.
